title: A Sorrow in Our Heart: The Life of Tecumseh
description: The critically acclaimed, award-winning author of A Sorrow in Our Heart brings to life an event that marked a major turning point in the history of the American frontierâ€”the settling of the Ohio River Valley. A biography of the famous Shawnee describes Tecumseh's plan to amalgamate all North American tribes into one people, his role as statesman and military strategist, and his death in the Battle of Thames.
author: Allan W. Eckert
